job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p>Title: <strong>Site Reliability Engineer</strong></p><p><strong>Location: 100% remote</strong></p><p><strong>Duration: 12 months+</strong></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><strong><u>Responsibilities</u></strong></p><p>Reduce Lead Time: The time from code written to entering production</p><p>Increase Deployment Frequency: How often deploys happen</p><p>Shorten Mean-Time-To-Recover (MTTR): How quickly can teams restore service after outages</p><p>Lessen Change Fail Rate: What percentage of deploys result in service impairment or an outage</p><p>Measure and optimize system performance, with an eye toward pushing our capabilities forward, getting ahead of customer needs, and innovating to continually improve</p><p>Provide primary operational support and engineering for multiple large, distributed software applications</p><p>Engage in and improve the whole lifecycle of services—from inception and design, deployment, operation, and refinement.</p><p>Support services before they go live through activities such as system design consulting, developing software platforms and frameworks, capacity planning, and launch reviews.</p><p>Maintain services once they are live by measuring and monitoring availability, latency, and overall system health.</p><p>Scale systems sustainably through mechanisms like automation; evolve systems by pushing for changes that improve reliability and velocity.</p><p>Practice sustainable incident response and blameless postmortems.</p><p>&nbsp;<strong><u>General</u></strong></p><p>Strong communication skills with ability to communicate complex technical concepts and align organization on decisions</p><p>Systematic problem-solving approach coupled with effective communication skills and a sense of drive.</p><p>Open to learning new ideas outside scope or knowledge</p><p><strong><u>Required skills:</u></strong></p><p>A proactive approach to spotting problems, areas for improvement, and performance bottlenecks</p><p>Passion for problem-solving, continuous improvement and optimization</p><p>Experience implementing, configuring and tuning Dynatrace</p><p>Experience programming in at least one of the following languages: C#, Java, Python, or Go.</p><p>Ability to debug, optimize code, and automate routine tasks.</p><p>Experience with Azure related resources such as VNets, Resource Groups, Functions, App Service, Azure VM, NSGs (Network Security Groups), Express Route &amp; RBAC (Role Based Access Control).</p><p>Experience with software deployment and orchestration technologies such as Helm, Docker, Kubernetes, Kubernetes Operators, Service Mesh (Istio)</p><p>Understanding of testing principles in the context of IaC</p>
